name: Fade to Red
description:
The Black Sun is rising and its influence brings a red plague upon the land. People of all classes are fleeing the plague and its up to you to buy them time.

  • Survive 9 unique missions fighting anything from fleshy airships to nimble jets and even your own allies turned against you.
  • Choose from 5 sleek 50's aircraft.
  • The Black Sun rises and the sky reddens with each mission.
  • Playable with both keyboard and gamepad.

Controls: WASD or left analog to pitch & roll, QE or R2L2 to yaw, Space or A button to shoot, Shift/Ctrl or R1L1 to throttle, ESC or Start button to pause, F11 for fullscreen, F12 to screenshot (Windows only), End key to quit the game (Instantly)

Personal note: I made this during the most busy month of my life so there is some rough edges but i tried my best.
